title: The Morose Mononokean, #1
description: Possessed by a demon, Ashiya’s been to the nurse’s office seven times since starting high school. He seeks help from the master of the four-and-a-half tatami mat Mononokean. Saving demons who have wandered into the mundane world and leading them back to the Underworld, this is the first volume of the morose master's demon-filled story.
author: Kiri Wazawa
